channel.title: math.CV updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CV updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Character varieties, hexagonal 3-webs and Hess connection
item.description: arXiv:2507.07542v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We investigate the existence of some affine structure on SL 2 (C)-character varieties on the four-punctured sphere through web and symplectic geometry. This work provides a new proof of non integrability (i.e. irreducibility) of Painlev{\'e} VI equations, previously proved by S. Cantat and the third author.
item.dc:creator: Adjaratou Arame Diaw (UCAD), Karamoko Diarra (USTTB), Frank Loray (IRMAR), Tangue Ndawa Bertuel
